p: The origin of subtype B TDR-TCs was mainly between 1999 and 2005: 23 pairs and 26 clusters â‰¥3 represented 60% (n = 88/146) of the PT-naive cohort in clusters harbouring viruses with SDRMs ( Fig 1B). There were no socio-demographic factors associated with the transmission of SDRMs for subtype B.
